page.title: 01Knockycoid Farm & Forest
page.content: All squares in this block are under afforestation except 2,4, & 8. One third of block 7 is privately owned commercial forestry the rest being forrestry commission. Half of block 10 is privately owned and the other half is again F.C owned. All of blocks 11 & 12 are privarely owned forestry. This ground is much more fertile ground than the block due west of it. The trees therefore are growing very rapidly and most of the ground is a thicket stage (private & state). The ground that is not afforested is a very successful sheep farm called Knockycoid Farm. The same family have farmed this area for generations. Two lochs are to be found in square 9 which are owned by forestry commission; however; the water is fished & restocked regularly by Barrhill Angling Club. Peaty Gley
